Package rocks.friedrich.taglets

Class Repolink

java.lang.Object
rocks.friedrich.taglets.Repolink
public class Repolink extends Object
Represents a link to a repository file in a web view, which is a URL that points to a specific location in a repository.

The permalink can include information about the host, owner, repository, file, commit ID, and line range.

For example: https://github.com/Josef-Friedrich/javadoc-taglets/blob/066acfb1c11107be603580b9a603cf3c892e3c60/src/main/java/rocks/friedrich/permalink_taglet/PermalinkTaglet.java#L23-L42
Author:
Josef Friedrich
